title: Compiler panics when given invalid Box type

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
So, I was fiddling with code generation (playing with boxes), and this happened. ### Code ```Rust #![no_std] #![feature(box_syntax, box_patterns, rustc_private, lang_items)] extern crate libc; #[lang = "owned_box"] // I tried adding an Option here, just to see what would happen! pub struct Box(Option<*mut T>); #[inline(always)] #[lang = "exchange_malloc"] unsafe fn allocate(size: usize, _align: usize) -> *mut u8 { let p = libc::malloc(size as libc::size_t) as *mut u8; return p; } #[inline(always)] #[lang = "box_free"] unsafe fn box_free(ptr: *mut T) { libc::free(ptr as *mut libc::c_void); } pub fn foo(a: Box, b: Box) -> Box { let box va = a; let box vb = b; return box (va + vb); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.48.0-nightly (0da580074 2020-09-22) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: i < this.fields.count()', /rustc/0da58007451a154da2480160429e1604a1f5f0ec/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/layout.rs:2074:17 ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: i < this.fields.count()', /rustc/0da58007451a154da2480160429e1604a1f5f0ec/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/layout.rs:2074:17 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: rustc_middle::ty::layout:: for &rustc_middle::ty::TyS>::field 2: as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::scalar_pair_element_llvm_type 3: as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::scalar_pair_element_llvm_type 4: as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::llvm_type 5: as rustc_codegen_llvm::abi::FnAbiLlvmExt>::llvm_type 6: rustc_codegen_llvm::mono_item::::predefine_fn 7: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit::module_codegen 8: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 9: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit 10: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_crate 11: ::codegen_crate 12: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 13: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen 14: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 15: rustc_span::with_source_map 16: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 17: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
